tests.name: Ranked-Probability Score
tests.description: The core scoring logic uses the RPS formula to compare the provider's predicted probabilities (p.h, p.d, p.a) against the actual outcome (o: "home", "draw", or "away"). The raw RPS value is transformed into a final score between potentially 0 and 100 using the formula Math.round((1 - rps) * 100).
